name: Planet Defender GELT
description:
#UPDATE

Bug fixed and playable version available (Version 1.1)

I won't lie, this game was rushed. I had a lot of work over the weekend.

But here it is.

Its a simple shooter, but your bullets will hit you and damage the terrain.

You can also collect the remnants of the enemies to fuel up a power up .

I'll list them here after I've submitted everything.

It runs on a custom engine, but this is the first I've published anything using OpenGL.

As far as my tests suggest, it runs at ~60 fps and never dips below 20.

I cannot speak for how much CPU usage or Memory Usage it will take on your machines, but on my Desktop it only used a few megabytes of RAM and negligible amounts of my processor usage.

Controls

Left and Right to move, Space (Hold for different altitude) to fire a shot.

Don't get hit by your own bullets.

Red Power is standard

Green Power allows your bullets to bounce off of enemies

Blue Power can rebuild the terrain

Yellow power makes you faster

Magenta power makes you score double points

Cyan power gives you super bullets.

This game was so very rushed, to the point where much content was left out.

It lacks polish and most likely has bugs, so have fun with it I guess.

"A delayed game is only delayed until it is released, but a rushed game is rushed forever"

If you are interested or at least intrigued by the concept, I'd be glad to release a polished, finished version. Thanks for your feedback.

#UPDATE

Bug fixed and slightly more playable version available (Version 1.1)
